extendedInfo.description: Gain a mastery of Spanish!Spanish Class contains a complete offline written Spanish course, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises. All words and phrases are available to listen to as well.Great support when you learn Spanish. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary, grammar and phrases with.This total course covers the following content:* All tenses, with all irregular verb forms highlighted* 4000+ words, sorted into different categories such as food, transport and vacation* 40 grammar articles, covering all Spanish Grammar* 200 useful phrasesAnd the following features:* Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises.* Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made.The first strength of this app is the extended content. No other Spanish app offers this much for the same price. The other strength lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises.The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox.If you are serious about learning Spanish, this app is for you.IMPORTANTWe believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating.Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech.SOME COMPLIMENTS WE FOUND IN OUR MAILBOXYour language apps rock!! The interface is well designed, simple yet very very effective and it is as you described, very addictive.Your language apps are the best on the market. You offer far more for less.Unbelievable! I'm blown away by this app. It's almost as good as my pc version that I paid $$$ for except voice recognition could be better. Definitely worth the money.Perfect format. I like how quickly you jump on comments. Keep up the good work.PLANNED UPDATES* Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a âwritingâ instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge.* Image exercises, such as on clock times.* Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Really nice app. Read aloud buttons don\'t always seem to work and it would be great to have an option to turn off \'vosotros\' questions if you\'re only interested in Latin American Spanish like me so that test scores are accurate, but other than that I would recommend.
reviews.author: Matt Steed

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good,  but not complete...  I still miss some important verbs.  Couldn\'t find grammar for stem changing verbs. The verb \"to rain\"  is applied for all person forms...    Other than that it\'s helping me greatly. And it\'s the best of its kind.
reviews.author: Florian Jouanel

reviews.title: Good app and fun to use.
reviews.comment: A good app and very good value. Interesting choice of some verbs in the tests (I kidnap, we squander, they snow, etc), but it adds to the fun of using the app!
reviews.author: Martin Dawson

reviews.title: Nice app for learning Spanish.
reviews.comment: Many great features and very nice to look at. Easy to navigate and simple menus. I would like to be able to ADD WORDS so I could use it for studying for my Spanish class ie \"la billetera = wallet.\" Of the preset word list, I really like how I can pick which words show up in the columns. I think for 5 bucks it should let us add words and then it would be a great study aid for Spanish students. I like the columns vocabulary list view. A flash card section would be nice.   If they let us add words it would be a 5 star app to me but I need to study a specific set of words for school and some of the words are not in this app.
reviews.author: Tim Tam

reviews.title: Very good tool
reviews.comment: A great learning and practising tool. Loads of different tests and a good resource. Some more translation of the sentences once you answer a question would be useful.
reviews.author: Michael Lumb

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: This app is very boring. I am uninstalling even tho I paid. Don\'t waste ur money!
reviews.author: dymestatus B.

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.comment: I feel that this application would be a lot more functional if text to speech was available for all the written material. It\'s more like a Spanish workbook rather than an interactive application. It is not very fun because of this.
reviews.author: Alivia Brooks

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: helps out just fine
reviews.author: Sabrina Charles

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Excellent content and interaction.  I use daily.
reviews.author: Faye Ally

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Larry Jones

reviews.comment: A bit limited but very motivational given the number of \"tests\" available each of which clearly shows any wrong answers and the correct answer.
reviews.author: David Jowett

reviews.title: Great for practice
reviews.comment: I took Spanish for 4 years in high school and used this app to keep practicing and it worked great for me
reviews.author: Joshua Jackson

reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez

reviews.title: Cant enable audio
reviews.comment: If I could enable the audio I would give it Five stars. LG OPTIMUS G
reviews.author: ras mon

reviews.title: Me gusta
reviews.comment: Muy bien!!! Fun while learning
reviews.author: Agnes Elumba

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Helps me learn everyday I recommend to beginners.
reviews.author: Brian Mullins

reviews.title: Perfection
reviews.comment: Great tool because its an easy read.
reviews.author: Toriano Taylor

reviews.comment: Great for practicing vocab
reviews.author: Jason Gerringer

reviews.comment: Nice practice tool.
reviews.author: dorit hillmann

reviews.title: Asus Tranformer Prime
reviews.comment: Can\'t use program. Select what exercises I want to do, click \"okay\" and it crashes.
reviews.author: Andrew Doster
